summary: An acclaimed actress and her psychiatrist husband escape on a relaxing vacation but on the first night, they meet a young girl with blood on her hands and a penchant for mind games.
cast: William Baldwin|Estella Warren|Sarah Butler|Jeffrey Pierce|Katia Winter|Kim Bodnia|Vivienne McKee|Claire Ross-Brown|Jon Pihl|Torben Sloth Thomsen|Thomas Sauerberg|Kenneth Marsner|Gadi Cimand|Javier Torreiro|Ole Dupont|Sanny Jakobsen|Helle Pilar Larsen|Sonja Molina|Christoffer Høyer Rasmussen
keywords: infidelity|abortion|suspended in a plastic bag|sex in a coffin|psychiatrist
title: Una extraña entre nosotros
